lines.text: Me and my boys chew up towns like this.
Then that tells me something. You've never been through this town before!
What makes you so damn sure of that?
Because this little town would ruin those pretty white teeth of yours.

Billy, they were the biggest things I ever saw and they had tattoos on them. You know, I may be in love. I might just go right back in there and ask her out on a date. (Biker flies out of the bar through the door) Mayday! billy, send backup! all units report to the old blues bar, over!
Bones will mend, wounds will heal, diseases cured. Isn't that worth everything? Anything!
Yeah, look, before we go to Stockholm and pick up the Nobel Prize I want the works done on him.
I did it John! I made history! We did! I'm the only one left who knows how we did it.
I knew you'd say that! I knew you would! Well, I was hoping you would.
It's no use, Dan. I just can't start seeing you again.
Okay? You sure do give up easy. You really know how to make a girl feel good.
I didn't say I give up. I just said okay.
Okay, that's it! Fenito, the end of the chapter.
You sure do give up easy.
I don't care if he killed 100 people! We are scientists not moralists!
